channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China Clamps Down Even Harder on Rare Earth Exports
item.description: The move is Beijing’s latest attempt to tighten control over global production of the metals, which are essential to the manufacture of computer chips...

item.title: Israel and Hamas reach initial ceasefire deal. And, National Guard arrive near Chicago
item.description: Israel and Hamas have agreed to the "first phase" of a ceasefire deal. And, hundreds of National Guard troops were deployed to the greater Chicago are...

item.title: We Have a Cease-Fire. Now the Middle East Needs Leadership.
item.description: Promises of peace between Jews and Palestinians must be turned into reality.

item.title: Pope Leo says faith and love for migrants are connected
item.description: In his first major document as leader of the Catholic Church, Pope Leo urges nations and believers to care for the poorest in society.

item.title: The 10th and final escapee from a New Orleans jailbreak is captured after five months
item.description: Ten men escaped the Orleans Parish Justice Center through a hole in the wall behind a toilet on May 16. Most were captured within days, but Derrick Gr...

item.title: Laszlo Krasznahorkai Is Awarded Nobel Prize in Literature
item.description: ​The prize committee said the Hungarian writer’s work “reaffirms the power of art.”

item.title: China curbs rare earth exports, raising stakes before Trump-Xi talks
item.description: Analysts say Thursday's announcement is China's bid to strengthen its leverage in trade talks with the U.S., ahead of a planned leaders' meeting.

item.title: Why being in credit card debt doesn't mean you're bad with money
item.description: Financial educators bust three common myths about credit card debt — and explain why these negative assumptions can hold us back from making smart mon...

item.title: What the Arrival of A.I. Video Generators Like Sora Means for Us
item.description: Welcome to the era of fakery. The widespread use of instant video generators like Sora will bring an end to visuals as proof.

item.title: Netanyahu’s Political Fortunes May Be Transformed by Gaza Deal
item.description: The Israeli prime minister appeared backed into a corner in Gaza diplomacy. But this deal could greatly increase his room for maneuver, analysts said.

item.title: As Israelis Express Relief at Hamas Deal, Some Ask Why It Took So Long
item.description: The families of hostages held in Gaza were elated that their loved ones might return soon. Still, some expressed frustration at Israel’s government ah...

item.title: Netanyahu’s Political Fortunes May Be Transformed by Gaza Deal
item.description: The Israeli prime minister appeared backed into a corner in Gaza diplomacy. But this deal could greatly increase his room for maneuver, analysts said.

item.title: Celebrations After Israel and Hamas Near Cease-Fire Deal
item.description: Palestinians and Israelis celebrated the news that Hamas and Israel had agreed on the first phase of an agreement proposed by President Trump.

item.title: Live Updates: Israel-Hamas Deal Paves Way for Gaza Cease-Fire
item.description: Israel said a truce would take effect on Friday and start a 72-hour window to exchange hostages and prisoners. President Trump said he might travel to...
